tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE currency_transactions (   transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   player_id UUID NOT NULL,   currency_type STRING NOT NULL,   amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,   transaction_type STRING NOT NULL,   transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE currency_transactions (
	transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT NOT NULL,
	transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	amount INT NOT NULL,
	transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE currency_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    date_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  amount INT,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(255),
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE players (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(255),
  balance INT
)

CREATE TABLE items (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  price INT
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
  player_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE currencies (
  currency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  currency_name VARCHAR(255),
  exchange_rate FLOAT
)
